https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/k6UvcQ6vrod3EhYtDDC0jDwbQ9B.jpg A documentary that will inspire you to overcome. It took Chris Norton 7 years to walk his bride 7 yards down the aisle after a life-altering football tackle. 7 Yards: The Chris Norton Story
